channel.title: Rachael Fairs - Specialist Neurological Physiotherapist
channel.description: Recent content on Rachael Fairs - Specialist Neurological Physiotherapist

item.title: About Me
item.description: I feel very lucky to have a job I really enjoy. It is also a huge privilege to get to know, and work with, patients and their families/carers in their own environment towards what is most important to them at that time. I qualified with a 1st Class degree in physiotherapy in 2004, having initially studied Geography at Durham University (1998-2001 BSc 1st Class Hons), and have over 15 years experience specialising in the field of neuro rehabilitation.

item.title: Fees
item.description: Initial Assessment Home Visit (75 minute consultation): £80 Follow Up Home Visit (55 minute session): £70 Administration (e.g. Supporting letters/Reports/Onward Referrals) - £35
